timeline.message: Let isAtLeastInstructorInCourse() method retrieve the user
Retrieve exam from database after security checks are finished

timeline.bodyText:
I don't think forbidden() is a good choice here. The user is allowed however the exam doesn't belong to the course.
You could either agrue with a "notFound()" here since you can't finde an exercise belonging to the course, maybe a HTTP 409 would be a good choice here?
timeline.author: julian-christl

timeline.bodyText:
I don't think forbidden() is a good choice here. The user is allowed however the exam doesn't belong to the exercise group.
You could either agrue with a "notFound()" here since you can't finde an exercise belonging to the course, maybe a HTTP 409 would be a good choice here?
timeline.author: julian-christl

timeline.bodyText:
I don't think forbidden() is a good choice here. The user is allowed however the student exam doesn't belong to the exam.
You could either agrue with a "notFound()" here since you can't finde an exercise belonging to the course, maybe a HTTP 409 would be a good choice here?

Move all access check methods to ExamAccessService
